headline: Trade Desk (TTD): Reassessing Valuation After a Steep Share Price Reset
summary: Trade Desk (TTD) has been under pressure lately, with the stock sliding about 11% over the past month and roughly 66% year to date, even as revenue and earnings continue to grow. See our latest analysis for Trade Desk. That slump reflects fading momentum more than broken fundamentals, as the 30 day share price return of minus 11.3 percent and year to date share price return of roughly minus 66.7 percent sit alongside a one year total shareholder return of about minus 70.6 percent. If this...
